channel.title: Ai Safety Atlas on Serhat Giydiren
channel.description: Recent content in Ai Safety Atlas on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 3, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on Chapter 5 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on evaluation methods for assessing the safety and alignment of advanced AI systems, including benchmarks and robustness testing.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 24, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the audio version of Chapter 4 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on governance strategies for safe AI development, including safety standards, international treaties, and regulatory policies.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 23, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the audio version of Chapter 3 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on strategies for mitigating AI risks, including technical approaches like alignment and interpretability, and governance strategies.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 22, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the audio version of Chapter 2 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on various AI risks, including misuse, accidents, and systemic risks, and the challenges of alignment failures.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 21, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the audio version of Chapter 1 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on AI capabilities, the progression toward AGI, and frameworks for measuring AI intelligence.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 14, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on Chapter 1 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on AI capabilities, the progression toward AGI, and frameworks for measuring AI intelligence.
